title: Features
description: With FetchMe, we are confident that anyone from seasoned engineers to marketing can understand your API request workflow!

content.title: No Request Limit
content.description: We built Slack to improve your workflow, not hinder it! Go crazy and send some Fetch requests!

content.title: Enhanced Collaboration
content.description: We seamlessly integrate API development into your existing workflow to allow team collaboration and increased productivity.

content.title: Familiar Syntax
content.description: We based our command app off cURL. Make API requests using your familiar cURL commands. Send everything from simple GET requests to POST requests with headers and data.

content.title: Multiple Request Types
content.description: Send everything from simple GET requests to POST requests with special headers and data!
